trans-unit.source: Gotta focus.
trans-unit.target: Gotta focus.

trans-unit.source: Barely enough room to stand, but not enough room to lie down comfortably.
trans-unit.target: Barely enough room to stand, but not enough room to lie down comfortably.

trans-unit.source: Especially with the tree.
trans-unit.target: Especially with the tree.

trans-unit.source: I do push-ups against the wall to get myself pumped up for the big moment.
trans-unit.target: I do push-ups against the wall to get myself pumped up for the big moment.

trans-unit.source: Today I'm getting out of here.
trans-unit.target: Today I'm getting out of here.

trans-unit.source: I //have// to get out of here.
trans-unit.target: I //have// to get out of here.

trans-unit.source: I hear a soft hydraulic hiss from the speakers—the telltale sound of someone entering the containment antechamber.
trans-unit.target: I hear a soft hydraulic hiss from the speakers—the telltale sound of someone entering the containment antechamber.

trans-unit.source: The hairs on the back of my neck prickle.
trans-unit.target: The hairs on the back of my neck prickle.

trans-unit.source: The mics are on.
trans-unit.target: The mics are on.

trans-unit.source: For the next few minutes, I'll be able to talk to them.
trans-unit.target: For the next few minutes, I'll be able to talk to them.

trans-unit.source: I have to make it count.
trans-unit.target: I have to make it count.

trans-unit.source: A panel in the wall is pulled back and I see Valente smiling at me through reinforced glass.
trans-unit.target: A panel in the wall is pulled back and I see Valente smiling at me through reinforced glass.

trans-unit.source: His beard is noticeably longer than before.
trans-unit.target: His beard is noticeably longer than before.

trans-unit.source: //Deep breaths.
trans-unit.target: //Deep breaths.

trans-unit.source:
Deep fucking breaths.//
"Good morning," Valente says. "
trans-unit.target:
Deep fucking breaths.//
"Good morning," Valente says. "

trans-unit.source: Good to see you up and active."
trans-unit.target: Good to see you up and active."

trans-unit.source: I don't reply.
trans-unit.target: I don't reply.

trans-unit.source: The opening formalities are almost never transcribed.
trans-unit.target: The opening formalities are almost never transcribed.

trans-unit.source: Better to save myself for the real thing.
trans-unit.target: Better to save myself for the real thing.

trans-unit.source: Valente's eyes shift downward and his arms shuffle slightly.
trans-unit.target: Valente's eyes shift downward and his arms shuffle slightly.

trans-unit.source: I can only see him from the chest up, but I know he's looking at a prepared interview outline, if not an outright script.
trans-unit.target: I can only see him from the chest up, but I know he's looking at a prepared interview outline, if not an outright script.

trans-unit.source: If I pull this off, he's going to need to improvise.
trans-unit.target: If I pull this off, he's going to need to improvise.

trans-unit.source: "Please state your name for the record."
trans-unit.target: "Please state your name for the record."

trans-unit.source:
//Moment of truth.//
"Hello," I begin.
trans-unit.target:
//Moment of truth.//
"Hello," I begin.

trans-unit.source: It's familiar.
trans-unit.target: It's familiar.

trans-unit.source: Universal.
trans-unit.target: Universal.

trans-unit.source: Makes it easier to hear through whatever preterlinguistic bullshit I'm dealing with. "
trans-unit.target: Makes it easier to hear through whatever preterlinguistic bullshit I'm dealing with. "

trans-unit.source: My name is Doctor Heerad Sangha.
trans-unit.target: My name is Doctor Heerad Sangha.

trans-unit.source: I am designated [[[scp-2337|SCP two-three-three-seven]]], as you told me previously."
trans-unit.target: I am designated [[[scp-2337|SCP two-three-three-seven]]], as you told me previously."

trans-unit.source: I hold my breath.
trans-unit.target: I hold my breath.

trans-unit.source: “Thank you,” says Valente.
trans-unit.target: “Thank you,” says Valente.

trans-unit.source: His expression hasn't changed.
trans-unit.target: His expression hasn't changed.

trans-unit.source: I feel my heart drop to the floor.
trans-unit.target: I feel my heart drop to the floor.

trans-unit.source: "Fuck!"
trans-unit.target: "Fuck!"

trans-unit.source:
"Listen, SCP two-three-three-seven—"
"I'm Harry fucking Sangha, Val!"
trans-unit.target:
"Listen, SCP two-three-three-seven—"
"I'm Harry fucking Sangha, Val!"

trans-unit.source: "—you seem to have a pre-established relationship of sorts with several of the more dangerous creatures in our custody."
trans-unit.target: "—you seem to have a pre-established relationship of sorts with several of the more dangerous creatures in our custody."

trans-unit.source: I pound my fists on the glass.
trans-unit.target: I pound my fists on the glass.

trans-unit.source: Valente has no reaction.
trans-unit.target: Valente has no reaction.

trans-unit.source: I scream.
trans-unit.target: I scream.

trans-unit.source: "Fuck!"
trans-unit.target: "Fuck!"

trans-unit.source: "Yes.
trans-unit.target: "Yes.

trans-unit.source: Please elaborate on the exact nature of this relationship."
trans-unit.target: Please elaborate on the exact nature of this relationship."

trans-unit.source: "Oh, I'll fucking elaborate, Val!
trans-unit.target: "Oh, I'll fucking elaborate, Val!

trans-unit.source: I played the game of cosmic fucking Russian roulette, just like you, except there was a bullet in my chamber.
trans-unit.target: I played the game of cosmic fucking Russian roulette, just like you, except there was a bullet in my chamber.

trans-unit.source: I poked at one too many soft points in reality and someday you will too, my friend.
trans-unit.target: I poked at one too many soft points in reality and someday you will too, my friend.

trans-unit.source: That's probably where it all fucking comes from, over and over, we all just keep ending up on the other side of the glass.
trans-unit.target: That's probably where it all fucking comes from, over and over, we all just keep ending up on the other side of the glass.

trans-unit.source: Fuck!"
trans-unit.target: Fuck!"

trans-unit.source: Valente looks confused and slightly annoyed.
trans-unit.target: Valente looks confused and slightly annoyed.

trans-unit.source: My hands are sore from pounding on the glass.
trans-unit.target: My hands are sore from pounding on the glass.

trans-unit.source: I'm breathing heavily now.
trans-unit.target: I'm breathing heavily now.

trans-unit.source: So much for calm.
trans-unit.target: So much for calm.

trans-unit.source: So much for focus.
trans-unit.target: So much for focus.

trans-unit.source: I have to get out of here.
trans-unit.target: I have to get out of here.

trans-unit.source:
//I have to get—//
"Please repeat that statement in the dialect used by the Foundation."
trans-unit.target:
//I have to get—//
"Please repeat that statement in the dialect used by the Foundation."

trans-unit.source: "Go to hell, Val!"
trans-unit.target: "Go to hell, Val!"

trans-unit.source: The floor rushes up to meet me.
trans-unit.target: The floor rushes up to meet me.

trans-unit.source: I'm on my knees, sobbing, forehead pressing into the base of the tree.
trans-unit.target: I'm on my knees, sobbing, forehead pressing into the base of the tree.

trans-unit.source: All the months I'd been here I'd kept it cool.
trans-unit.target: All the months I'd been here I'd kept it cool.

trans-unit.source: And here I am, grown-ass man with a PhD, crying his fucking eyes out into the last stupid fucking tree he'll see until the day he dies.
trans-unit.target: And here I am, grown-ass man with a PhD, crying his fucking eyes out into the last stupid fucking tree he'll see until the day he dies.

trans-unit.source: "Please discontinue yodeling."
trans-unit.target: "Please discontinue yodeling."

trans-unit.source: I wipe my eyes on my naked arms to clear off the tears and snot.
trans-unit.target: I wipe my eyes on my naked arms to clear off the tears and snot.

trans-unit.source: The fluids mix with the bits of bark and grit on my face, and I begin to seriously regret my meltdown.
trans-unit.target: The fluids mix with the bits of bark and grit on my face, and I begin to seriously regret my meltdown.

trans-unit.source: "I'm not making any sense to you, am I?"
trans-unit.target: "I'm not making any sense to you, am I?"

trans-unit.source: "We need you to cooperate and explain your answer in a coherent way."
trans-unit.target: "We need you to cooperate and explain your answer in a coherent way."

trans-unit.source: "What's the fucking point?
trans-unit.target: "What's the fucking point?

trans-unit.source: I've tried everything I can and nothing gets through!
trans-unit.target: I've tried everything I can and nothing gets through!

trans-unit.source: You can ask anything you want, it's pointless!"
trans-unit.target: You can ask anything you want, it's pointless!"

trans-unit.source: I turn to face him.
trans-unit.target: I turn to face him.

trans-unit.source: He's got that look of a long-suffering scientist who spent decades of his life earning degrees.
trans-unit.target: He's got that look of a long-suffering scientist who spent decades of his life earning degrees.

trans-unit.source: A man who left every relationship he had to join a shadow organization, only to end up bored, frustrated, and confused.
trans-unit.target: A man who left every relationship he had to join a shadow organization, only to end up bored, frustrated, and confused.

trans-unit.source: I had that look once.
trans-unit.target: I had that look once.

trans-unit.source: I envy it.
trans-unit.target: I envy it.

trans-unit.source: "You're not hearing me, are you?"
trans-unit.target: "You're not hearing me, are you?"

trans-unit.source: he asks me.
trans-unit.target: he asks me.

trans-unit.source: "No, you're not fucking hearing //me//, asshole.
trans-unit.target: "No, you're not fucking hearing //me//, asshole.

trans-unit.source: Fuck you!"
trans-unit.target: Fuck you!"

trans-unit.source: He stares at me blankly for a second, and I swear I see him roll his fucking eyes.
trans-unit.target: He stares at me blankly for a second, and I swear I see him roll his fucking eyes.

trans-unit.source: "... cack?"
trans-unit.target: "... cack?"

trans-unit.source: he says.
trans-unit.target: he says.

trans-unit.source: He's looking at me the way a teenage babysitter looks at a toddler that just shat its pants.
trans-unit.target: He's looking at me the way a teenage babysitter looks at a toddler that just shat its pants.

trans-unit.source: I slam the glass again.
trans-unit.target: I slam the glass again.

trans-unit.source: In the distance, I hear laughter.
trans-unit.target: In the distance, I hear laughter.

trans-unit.source: "Is that what I fucking sound like?!
trans-unit.target: "Is that what I fucking sound like?!

trans-unit.source:
Motherfucking shit fuck //fuck!//"
Valente heaves a big, weary sigh.
trans-unit.target:
Motherfucking shit fuck //fuck!//"
Valente heaves a big, weary sigh.

trans-unit.source: He tucks his hands in at his sides and makes this shiteating, condescending, motherfucking face.
trans-unit.target: He tucks his hands in at his sides and makes this shiteating, condescending, motherfucking face.

trans-unit.source: My hands shake.
trans-unit.target: My hands shake.

trans-unit.source: Everything disappears except his fucking face and that fucking, //fucking// laughter.
trans-unit.target: Everything disappears except his fucking face and that fucking, //fucking// laughter.

trans-unit.source: "Snackutations Doctor Spanko, cack!"
trans-unit.target: "Snackutations Doctor Spanko, cack!"

trans-unit.source: he squeaks. "
trans-unit.target: he squeaks. "

trans-unit.source: You am authoritater?
trans-unit.target: You am authoritater?

trans-unit.source: Explainerate."
trans-unit.target: Explainerate."

trans-unit.source: Time seems to stand still and move in fast forward all at once.
trans-unit.target: Time seems to stand still and move in fast forward all at once.

trans-unit.source: I'm beating against the glass with a thick branch I don't remember breaking off.
trans-unit.target: I'm beating against the glass with a thick branch I don't remember breaking off.

trans-unit.source: Valente is alarmed.
trans-unit.target: Valente is alarmed.

trans-unit.source: He's //reacting//. I beat at the glass with everything I have, barely registering the spots of blood flying off my hands.
trans-unit.target: He's //reacting//. I beat at the glass with everything I have, barely registering the spots of blood flying off my hands.

trans-unit.source: The glass cracks.
trans-unit.target: The glass cracks.

trans-unit.source: It shouldn't be possible.
trans-unit.target: It shouldn't be possible.

trans-unit.source: None of this should be possible.
trans-unit.target: None of this should be possible.

trans-unit.source: None of this should be happening.
trans-unit.target: None of this should be happening.

trans-unit.source: The laughter is so loud I can hardly see.
trans-unit.target: The laughter is so loud I can hardly see.

trans-unit.source: The glass breaks.
trans-unit.target: The glass breaks.

trans-unit.source: Valente covers his eyes to shield them from errant shards.
trans-unit.target: Valente covers his eyes to shield them from errant shards.

trans-unit.source: The branch in my hands is different.
trans-unit.target: The branch in my hands is different.

trans-unit.source: It //is// my hands.
trans-unit.target: It //is// my hands.

trans-unit.source: Glass is growing from the end of it.
trans-unit.target: Glass is growing from the end of it.

trans-unit.source: Why not?
trans-unit.target: Why not?

trans-unit.source: I smile my first genuine smile in months.
trans-unit.target: I smile my first genuine smile in months.

trans-unit.source: None of this should be happening to me.
trans-unit.target: None of this should be happening to me.

trans-unit.source: None of it is going to happen to you, Val.
trans-unit.target: None of it is going to happen to you, Val.

trans-unit.source: He's on the floor.
trans-unit.target: He's on the floor.

trans-unit.source: I reach into the antechamber.
trans-unit.target: I reach into the antechamber.

trans-unit.source: There's a sting on my ass.
trans-unit.target: There's a sting on my ass.

trans-unit.source: The laughter fades.
trans-unit.target: The laughter fades.

trans-unit.source: The world goes dark.
trans-unit.target: The world goes dark.

trans-unit.source: ##white|Dude, oh my god, oh my god.
trans-unit.target: ##white|Dude, oh my god, oh my god.

trans-unit.source: It's just the gift that keeps on giving.
trans-unit.target: It's just the gift that keeps on giving.

trans-unit.source: They shot him in the //ass,// dude!##
trans-unit.target: They shot him in the //ass,// dude!##

trans-unit.source: ##white|Yeah, we're totally going to hell for this.##
trans-unit.target: ##white|Yeah, we're totally going to hell for this.##
